content.rendered:
Nate and his two teenage daughters travel to a game reserve in South Africa. However, their journey soon turns into a fight for survival when a bloodthirsty lion starts chasing them.

Directed By Baltasar Kormákur

Written By Jaime Primak Sullivan. Ryan Engle

Stars Liyabuya Gongo. Martin Munro. Daniel Hadebe
